doc.title: Kuolema nyky-Suomessa
doc.plot: An anonymous summer's day in a small village in the Finnish hinterland that appears almost completely untouched by modern times. Yet there are signs that even this village will be trampled within the foreseeable future by the ruthless forces of modernity. In the meantime, nature sees opportunities to recapture this territory from humanity. The villagers are marked by concerns about what's to come.
